title: Hypothetical Learning Trajectory Project for Understanding the Concept of Infinite Solutions in Trigonometric Equations

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of finite solution sets, basic trigonometric function concepts, and foundational knowledge of equations and inequalities
context.additional_context: A course improving mathematical modeling skills through practical problem-solving for learners in managerial/leadership roles, with a collaborative learning environment utilizing personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can visualize and interpret the infinite solution set of trigonometric equations graphically
Learners can logically explain the cognitive transition process from finite solution models to infinite solution models
Learners can model real-world social problems as trigonometric equations and present solution sets by project
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
